item.title: New Container: Diskover
item.description: We have released a new container for Diskover! diskover is a file system crawler and disk space usage software that uses Elasticsearch to index and manage data across heterogeneous storage systems.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Diskover!

diskover is a file system crawler and disk space usage software that uses Elasticsearch to index and manage data across heterogeneous storage systems.
